short_summary: Supply of Informatics professional services for the implementation of telecommunications, network and cloud transformation initiatives.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: All bids must be submitted by August 11th, 2023 at 14:00 PM EDT to be considered responsive. This RFP is for the provision of Informatics professional services for the implementation of telecommunications, network and cloud transformation initiatives.
tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
full_summary:
**Title**
W6369-23P5OZ – Public Services Call for the Implementation of Telecommunication, Network, and Cloud Transformation

**Reference Number**
WS4025444907-Doc4056662338

**Amendment Number**
10

**Solicitation Number**
WS4025444907

**Publication Date**
June 16, 2023

**Tender Closing Date**
August 11, 2023, 14:00:00 Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)

**Amendment Date**
March 14, 2024

**Expected Contract Start Date**
December 15, 2023

**Expected Contract End Date**
N/A

**Status**
Expired

**UNSPSC Code**
* 80101507 (Information Technology Consultation Services)

**Procurement Category**
SRV (Services)

**Notice Type**
Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement

**Procurement Method**
Competitive – Selective Tendering

**Selection Criteria**
Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Trade Agreements**
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**Regions of Delivery**
National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contracting Entity**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Contact Information**
For any queries or clarifications, please contact:

Nathalie Hamelin (SPAC/PSPC)
nathalie.hamelin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL**
The complete tender document and any relevant attachments can be accessed at: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16609184?extsite=MTY2MDkxODRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
